lead_paragraph: NASH--Jeffrey Paul, 69, son of Harry and Naomi Kane Nash, died peacefully of unexpected heart failure on February 20th at his home in Manhattan. A lifelong New Yorker, Jeff began his investment banking career at DuPont Walston and then A.G. Becker before founding Rector Street Capital. Friend and confidant for half a century. Brilliant, exceedingly funny, loyal, bold when appropriate. Humble, sincere, passionate and hard working, he will be missed by all his colleagues and his many friends. Loving husband of Cassandra. A memorial celebration of his life will be held at a later date. Rest in peace RR Dog. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  NASH, JEFFREY PAUL

Brilliant, exceedingly funny, loyal, bold when appropriate. Humble, sincere, passionate and hard working, he will be missed by all his colleagues and his many friends. Loving husband of Cassandra. A memorial celebration of his life will be held at a later date. Rest in peace RR Dog. 1/3
